acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped double values with @PodamDoubleValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleDoubleValuesWithThePodamDoubleValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.DoubleValuePojo

Then the Object DoubleRangeValuesPojo ( doubleFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 doubleFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 88.01815158833354 doubleFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 614.4193574802656 doubleFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245 doubleObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 doubleObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 55.694850624273 doubleObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 670.0507692575304 doubleObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245 ) should not be null
Then the double value (0} should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the double value 88.01815158833354 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the double value 614.4193574802656 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
Then the Object 10.1245 should not be null
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
